title: 04/16/2021 - DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/16/2021 - DPS Best Of
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker, in for Dan Patrick, debate whether Julian Edelman is worthy of the Hall of Fame. Frank Isola joins the show to discuss the Lakers getting healthy, the reasoning for Kevin Durant not to play back-to-back games, if there is a chance Kyrie Irving could miss any playoff games and more from around the NBA. Andrew Brandt joins the show to share his thoughts on players skipping voluntary workouts and why the players are making a push on the matter after the CBA was signed, the dysfunction happening in the Eagles front office and more from around the NFL. Plus, the guys debate the legacy of NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
